User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:6.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.1
Build ID: 20110830092941

Steps to reproduce:

Generate a report for a product which has several bugs (with different reporters, assignees, and status values). On http://somebugzilla/query.cgi?format=report-graph specify a Bar Chart with the following attributes:
- Vertical Axis: "Status"
- Horizontal Axis: "Assignee Real Name"
- Vertical Labels: [x]
- Multiple Images: "Reporter Real Name"
- Plot Data Sets: Stacked


Actual results:

As expected, several graphs are displayed: one for each reporter and one for "total", each showing several columns (one for each assignee) with the different bug status counts stacked vertically.

BUT: All graphs are identical to the "Total" graph. There is no distinction between the different reporters.


Expected results:

The graph labeled with reporter "XYZ" should display only those bugs for which "XYZ" is the reporter.
comments.author: ingolf.steinbach@jena-optronik.de
